MEN ARE ENCOURAGED TO BOOK A PRIVATE ASAP
item.why: CLASS WILL BE HELD BY MASTER INSTRUCTOR SARAH TEAGLE , THE FOCUS WILL BE ON THE MEN AND ENHANCING THEIR LEADING SKILLS
